start.text:
Zoe is 4 years old and loves playing with her teddy bear, Ted.
One starry night, she finds a magical door in the middle of her room.
The door glows and seems to be calling them.

forest.text:
Zoe holds Ted's hand tightly and walks through the door.
Suddenly, they are in an enchanted forest full of colorful flowers and a sweet smell.
Two paths appear in front of them.

flowers.text:
The path of flowers is soft and shiny.
Many blue, red, and yellow butterflies fly everywhere.
A giant butterfly lands in front of them and speaks with a gentle voice.

butterfly_talk.text:
The butterfly smiles: 'Hello, Zoe and Ted! I know a secret place full of magic.
Do you want me to take you there?'

help_butterfly.text:
The butterfly guides Zoe and Ted among the flowers until they reach a huge tree.
Inside it there is a golden chest.
Zoe opens the chest and finds many magical toys that move on their own and talk to her.

end_toys.text:
Zoe and Ted play until they get tired, laughing a lot with the magical toys.
When the sun begins to set, they return home happily, carrying memories of the enchanted forest.

alone.text:
Zoe and Ted decide to continue without help.
They follow a flowered trail until they find a calm lake full of colorful little fish.

lake.text:
They sit by the lake, throw little stones in the water, and watch the circles forming.
Ted almost falls into the water and Zoe laughs a lot.

end_lake.text:
After having fun at the lake, Zoe and Ted find a path back to the magical door.
They return to the room, happy with the adventure.

stones.text:
The path of stones shines like stars on the ground.
At the end of the trail, a wooden bridge appears.
It is guarded by a talking frog.

frog.text: The frog says: 'To cross the bridge, you must answer my riddle: What goes up and down but never leaves its place?'

right_answer.text:
Zoe answers: 'It is the ladder!' The frog smiles and lets them pass.
On the other side, there is a magical garden full of enchanted toys that dance by themselves.

end_garden.text:
Zoe and Ted play in the enchanted garden until they get sleepy.
When they return home, Ted dozes in Zoe's arms, who smiles happily after the adventure.

wrong_answer.text: Ted answers: 'It is the cloud!' The frog laughs: 'That is not it!' Even so, he lets them rest under a nearby tree.

end_rest.text:
Zoe and Ted nap a little under the tree and wake up already in Zoe's room.
The magical door disappeared, but the memory of the adventure stayed in their hearts.
